testcase.classname: US18 : As a registered user, I want to have a page where I can see my Credit plans and get Credit.
testcase.name: TC16 : To move from the My Loans page to the Take Loan page,

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click on the login button.................................................passed * The registered "usernameIsmail" is entered in the Username Or Email box...passed * Registered user "password" is entered in the Your Password box............passed * Click on the login button to log in.......................................passed * Click on the Take Loan button.............................................passed * Click on the basic loan button............................................passed * Click on the Test Loan Apply Now button...................................passed * A number between "5000" and "15000" is entered in the Enter An Amount box.passed * Click on the Confirm button...............................................passed * Click on the Apply button under the Application Form Text.................passed * Verify that the Take Loan tab is visible..................................passed * Click on the Take Loan button.............................................passed * Verify that Loan Plans appears on the page that opens.....................undefined * Close the page............................................................skipped

testcase.name: The 'Submit Button' on the page must be visible and active. When clicked, the text
